meaningMnemonic: <radical>Say</radical> it at <radical>noon</radical>. That's the only time I will <kanji>allow</kanji> you to say it. That's the only time I will <kanji>permit</kanji> you to say it. Other than that, no saying anything. Noon is your window.
readingMnemonic: Where do these archaic horrible rules exist? The smaller version of Kyoto, Little <reading>Kyo</reading>to (きょ). Normal Kyoto is just fine. This smaller one is where a group of people went to create their own little town with their own dumb rules.
